Html:
Hi, I was hoping that somebody there could help me....

I am looking for a license for the Alvar library, for commercial use of it. I wrote an email to VTT, but I got no answer, at least for now.

So, I was wondering if somebody knows where to communicate to get the license, and any info about the pricing will be appreciated too.

 

 

Thans in advance,

They are probably in vacation right now. I heard that people in Finland tends to have long vacation around this time.

Ohan
Ohhh, didn't know that. I will try again next month. Thanks!
